title: Review of My Builds
body:
Looking for diamond and higher players, or even platinum players, to have a look at my fizz and/or zed and/or lee sin building on my match history and give me feedback.

Feedback and criticism is welcome and appreciated thanks

My fizz build rules:
don't build lich bane early - it is a possible 6th item
rush zhonyas if against ad mid-laner
rush hextech otherwise
other items: 
void staff (3rd-4th major item, not including boots)
rabadons deathcap (4th-5th major item, not including boots)
banshees veil

what boots on fizz? (full ad enemy team/ enemy team deals alot of ad AutoAttack damage - armour boots, full ap enemy/high cc on enemy team - merc treds)
otherwise magic pen boots

replies.body: Why not getting lich early though

lichbane has a 75% base ad ratio plus 50% bonus ap.
Fizz has around 80 base ad at lvl10, assuming by early you mean lichbane second item, meaning Fizz would have around 160ap with runes.
This gives him approx 140 extra damage from a sheen proc. 

AP fizz, the fizz Rodriguez usually plays, tends to only be able to proc lichbane a maximum of twice per assassination, for an extra 280 damage on a spell rotation.

Now we compare this value to the 40% magic pen of a voidstaff, which would tack on an around an extra 12% more total magic damage depending on enemy mr. 

A fizz spell rotation without ult does 460magic damage with a 290% ap ratio, excluding autos and making full use of w's passive and then triggering the triple damage active. Meaning 924 magic damage from w(passive)-q-e-w. Ignoring electrocute and other runes. This ends up giving 120 extra damage, so... umm... did not expect that... I guess lich bane isn't half bad?

I thought I remembered some pro player talking about how powerful an early void staff is but I guess I should have thought more about it, rather than blindly following advice.

I have no clue what I'm talking about, but I again realise why I'm bronze.
Something this math has made me think about was how about investigating haunting guise for early tankiness since at 1 item, 15 magic pen is pretty good for the gold cost, and then move on to protobelt and other items?
I guess they get early void because of the old runes? Also you removed damage of ult from your calculation, lowering the resulting effectiveness for void staff.

I feel like it isn't a gold efficient item early compared to void staff and rabadons. rabadons and void staff >(before) lich bane
I get at least 1 defensive item early-mid game or earlier on fizz usually otherwise I am too squishy. --> defensive item early>lich bane early
Lich gives you more movement speed for ganking, I guess that's one of the reasons why most people get it first.  Have you tried rushing proto belt if you don't like lich bane?

Yeah I usually rush proto belt on fizz. The exception is where I am against an ad mid-laner like zed, yasuo or talon and will then rush zhonyas. 

So you think lich bane is would be a good snowball item on fizz? Or in what situations and how early would you get lich bane on fizz? Considering the +7% movement speed it gives you for ganking and assassinating as well as the sustain it gives you due to the +250 mana.

Lol you are talking to the wrong person if you want specific comments or suggestions on fizz.  I can only say statistically the main stream build is either lich then proto or proto then lich. (not considering speciall occasions where u need to rush zhonya/zhonya parts).
